__e: She's undeniably sexy and I like it when she smiles at me, and a couple of other things, but that's it.
Most of us smile and say everything's fine when people ask - especially if it isn't.
You just want us to smile and go through this as though nothing's wrong, and I can't do that.
One minute the boy smiles at his father, the next he's got that in his heart.
She smiled at something I said, and I saw on her eyes that for a second she forgot what she really thinks of me.
But I'm starting to realize that maybe it's time I wake up and see that ship has sailed, and now a new ship has come into port.
I can't tell you what she'll say, but... "Fortune favors the bold."
Good things happen to good people. And you are a good man.
Don't you know that luck often gets born from misfortune?
Luck isn't on Lou's side. Looks like he's burned through some cash tonight.
You know what it's like to have a son who won't hug you, or smile at you? Won't even look you in the eye?
Well, goddamn, if he's not, I can smile for the both of us.
